thread.title: Donald Trump to host 'Saturday Night Live'
thread.title_full: Donald Trump to host 'Saturday Night Live'

author: Ben Flanagan | bflanagan@al.com
title: Donald Trump to host 'Saturday Night Live'
text:
Comments 
Donald Trump will host "Saturday Night Live" on Nov. 7, according to NBC. 
The GOP presidential frontrunner previously hosted the 16th episode of the show's 29th season on April 3, 2004. 
The episode's musical guest will be the artist Sia, who will Make her second appearance on the show. 
The show, now in its 41st season, has parodied Trump for years, most notably with Darrell Hammond playing the real estate mogul. Taran Killam currently plays Trump. 
How do you think Trump will do as host? We're guessing it's going to be huge. 
Trump also recently appeared on "The Tonight Show" where he and host Jimmy Fallon performed a sketch featuring Trump staring at himself in the mirror. Watch below.
